ack.p: This study was conducted with the collaboration of the Direction de la Recherche Forestière (DRF) of the Ministère des Forêts, de la Faune et des Parcs of Québec as well as the Canadian Wood Fibre Centre (CWFC) of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan). We thank the editor and reviewers for comments that helped to improve the content of this article. The authors thank Michel Rioux, Julie Gravel-Grenier, and all of the staff at the St. Modeste forest nursery (QMFWP), as well as Mario Renaud, Pascal Desjardins, Linda Veilleux, Jean Noël, and Guildo Gagnon from the DRF (QMFWP), Prof. Steeve Pépin of the Département des sols et génie Agroalimentaire, Marie Coyea of the Département des sciences du bois et de la forêt and Debra Christiansen Stowe of Takuvik Joint International Laboratory at Université Laval. The authors would also like to thank the staff of the Laboratoire de Chimie Organique et Inorganique (DRF, QMFWP).
